content: Hi, I'm Antonio Huete Jimenez from the DragonFly BSD project and I'd like to move forward with a better tier support for our operating system but I'm not sure how to do that yet so any hint is really appreciated. I'd also offer myself as a point of contact between DragonFly and the Rust team.
I believe one of the main hurdles to higher tier support is CI support.
Is there a set of requirements for the CI?
You should talk to the infra team on discord.
They might be here as well : @Pietro Albini
(it's better to ask on discord so the other members of the team can join the conversation)
